caller_intent: Richard wants to add a 2024 Ford Mustang to his existing insurance policy, specifying he only needs liability coverage for now and will add full coverage later when financially feasible.
resolution_steps: Agent Jamie confirms the need for VIN and loan information, which Richard provides.
Jamie asks about vehicle usage (commuting, spare use) and coverage preferences (liability only).
Jamie calculates the policy increase ($31.93) and confirms the addition with liability coverage.
Jamie emails proof of coverage to Richard's provided email address (garden gal 1222@aol.com).
knowledge_required: Premium calculation based on vehicle details and usage
Emailing proof of coverage via carrier systems
systems_referenced: Email system (for sending proof of coverage)
summary: Richard successfully added a 2024 Mustang to his policy with liability-only coverage. The agent processed the request, confirmed details, and sent proof of coverage via email. The call concluded with Richard expressing satisfaction and a minor complaint about the phone system.
